To Distribute the Amexio Colors Cli

## Steps

```bash
1. $ npm install -g jdeploy
2. $ mkdir amexio-colors
3. $ cd amexio-colors
4. $ jdeploy init

5. 
// Copy the files from the dist folder to amexio-colors folder
// build.sh contains commmands to do this. Change the file paths.

// To test the files Locally

6. $ jdeploy install 

// To Publish the software to npm
// pub.sh will publish the software to npm


7. $ ./pub.sh

```
